prompt: Centered, print-ready clean design on a vibrant hot pink solid background, isolated artwork only; no garment, no mockup, no fabric, no shadows. Overall aesthetic: retro sticker/vintage poster, bold black ink outlines, clean separations for screen printing, minimal gradients, high contrast, balanced negative space, isolated artwork only; no garment, no mockup, no fabric, no shadows.
